greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) generalizing the tangent numbers.
link: J. L. Arregui, Tangent and Bernoulli numbers related to Motzkin and Catalan numbers by means of numerical triangles.
mathematica: t[1, 1] = 1; t[1, 0] = 0; t[n_ /; n > 1, m_] := t[n, m] = m*(m+1)*Sum[t[n-1, k], {k, m-1, n-1}]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 1, 8}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 02 2013 *)
xref: If m*(m+1) is replaced in the formula by m*m, the first column is the sequence of secant numbers A000364. - Jose L. Arregui (arregui(AT)posta.unizar.es), Oct 09 2001
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 21 2001
